creditline: Lent by the Nelson-Atkins Museum of Art, Kansas City, Missouri, Gift of Gordon T. Beaham Jr.
description: conical shaped bowl on raised ungalzed foot; glaze, pink hue over entire body, thicker areas of white color glaze, around foot with cracquelure
medium: Stoneware with iron glaze, Hagi ware
title: Tea bowl (chawan)
